intro: Nasa pilovena, commonly known as the velvetleaf, is a tropical plant native to Central and South America. It is a flowering plant in the family Malvaceae, characterized by its large, heart-shaped leaves and showy yellow flowers. It has hairy, velvety foliage that gives it its common name and contributes to its ecological adaptability. Nasa pilovena is also used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
